user_question: What are the latest advancements in swarm robotics, and can you generate an image of a futuristic swarm robot?
final_answer: Recent advancements in swarm robotics include improved algorithms for decentralized control, enhanced communication protocols, and applications in environmental monitoring. Image of a futuristic swarm robot generated.
